title: Curriculum Vitae
text: Sorry, your browser does not support inline PDFs. Please download the PDF to view it: <a href="David Torres-Mendoza Resume 2024.pdf">Download CV</a>

title: David M.Torres-Mendoza
text:
I’m a Ph.D. student in Computer Science at UC Santa Cruz exploring ways to make computing more inclusive and accessible. My work is all about increasing participation and ensuring equity in computing. On top of that, I love data analysis and crafting visualizations that help make complex topics understandable to a broader audience.
